responses: McNyarenga AgriTech Solutions provides an Intelligent Irrigation System that revolutionizes agriculture with smart technology. We help farmers save water, time, and resources while maximizing crop yield through automated, data-driven irrigation solutions.

The Emergency Stop feature immediately shuts down all irrigation systems in case of emergencies. When activated: 1) All irrigation systems stop immediately 2) A red emergency banner appears 3) The system requires manual reset to restore operations. This is a critical safety feature for preventing water waste or damage.

To activate Emergency Stop: 1) Click the red Emergency button in the header (desktop) or mobile menu 2) Confirm the action in the popup modal 3) The system will immediately shut down all irrigation. Only use this in genuine emergencies as it requires manual reset to restore operations.

To reset after Emergency Stop: 1) Click the green Reset button (replaces Emergency button) 2) Confirm reset in the popup modal 3) The system will restore normal irrigation operations 4) The emergency banner will disappear. All systems will return to their previous settings.

Connection Status Indicators: 1) **Green pulsing dot**: System online and connected 2) **Red dot**: System offline 3) **Status text**: Shows 'Online' or 'Offline' with last connection time 4) **Disconnect button**: Available when online to manually disconnect. To manually disconnect: 1) Ensure system shows online status (green dot) 2) Click the disconnect button (if available) 3) Confirm any prompts 4) System will show offline status (red dot).
